DOC.brief_title: Community Based Distribution Injectable Contraceptives Tigray , Ethiopia
DOC.detailed_description: The overall goal project increase contraceptive prevalence reduce current high unmet need family plan rural area Ethiopia . In addition , project intend provide evidence policy maker expand community base distribution ( CBD ) injectible contraceptive , depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) , Tigray region Ethiopia community base reproductive health agent ( CBRHAs ) community health worker ( CHWs ) present . Following , specific aim project : - Provide evidence CBRHAs safely effectively distribute facilitate supply DMPA rural woman - Demonstrate CBRHAs deliver DMPA safety , effectiveness , acceptability outcomes HEWs - Increase access DMPA use CBRHAs
